project.name: Keira
project.description: High-performance local AI tool for removing watermarks from videos using LaMa ONNX model. All processing happens locally - your videos never leave your computer.

hero.headline: Remove Watermarks with AI Precision
hero.subheadline: Local processing. No cloud uploads. Professional results.

features.title: 100% Local Processing
features.description: Your videos never leave your computer. Complete privacy with on-device AI inference.

features.title: LaMa AI Model
features.description: State-of-the-art Large Mask Inpainting model for seamless watermark removal.

features.title: ROI Selection
features.description: Precisely select watermark regions for targeted removal with mask editing tools.

features.title: GPU Accelerated
features.description: ONNX Runtime with CUDA support for blazing fast processing on NVIDIA GPUs.

features.title: Multiple Formats
features.description: Support for MP4, WebM, MOV, AVI with quality presets from draft to lossless.

features.title: Job History
features.description: Track all your processing jobs with persistent history and quick re-processing.

steps.title: Upload Video
steps.description: Drag & drop or select your video file

steps.title: Select Region
steps.description: Draw a box around the watermark area

steps.title: Refine Mask
steps.description: Paint precise mask over the watermark

steps.title: Process & Download
steps.description: AI removes watermark, download clean video

v0Prompt: Create a modern, dark-themed landing page for Keira - an AI video watermark removal tool. Use glassmorphism design with dark grays (#0a0a0a, #1a1a1a) and green accents (#22c55e). Include: 1) Hero section with headline 'Remove Watermarks with AI Precision', gradient background, and two CTA buttons. 2) Features grid with 6 cards using lucide icons (shield-check, wand-2, layers, zap, film, history). 3) 4-step workflow timeline showing Upload > Select > Refine > Download. 4) Tech stack section with React, Python, ONNX logos. 5) Download section with platform buttons. Use Tailwind CSS, smooth animations, and responsive design. Font: Inter for body, JetBrains Mono for code.
